content.query:
CREATE VIEW SalesCustomer AS
select 
    CustomerID = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.CustomerID'),
    PersonID = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.PersonID'),
    StoreID = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.StoreID'),
    TerritoryID = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.TerritoryID'),
    AccountNumber = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.AccountNumber'),
    rowguid = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.rowguid'),
    ModifiedDate = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.ModifiedDate')
from openrowset(
    bulk 'https://demostreamdatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/datalake/Raw/Customer/Year=*/Month=*/Day=*/File=*/*.snappy.parquet',
    format = 'parquet')
 AS [r];
